
{{alias}}( x )
    Computes the sine and cosine integrals.

    Parameters
    ----------
    x: number
        Input value.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Array<number>
        Two element array containing the sine and cosine integrals (in that order).

    Examples
    --------
    > var y = {{alias}}( 3.0 )
    [ ~1.849, ~0.12 ]
    > y = {{alias}}( 0.0 )
    [ 0.0, -infinity ]
    > y = {{alias}}( -9.0 )
    [ ~-1.665, ~0.055 ]
    > y = {{alias}}( NaN )
    [ NaN, NaN ]

    See Also
    --------
